verbose_text: We next analyzed the expression levels of important markers regulating the EMT process and found decreased expression of E-cadherin in invasive forms of ductal (P-value = 0.002, 95% CI 0.024810 to 0.111190) and lobular (P-value < 0.0001, 95% CI 0.215719 to 0.363481) breast carcinomas and decreased expression of Desmoplakin in invasive forms of ductal (P-value = 0.0024, 95% CI 0.01501722 to 0.06983078) and lobular (P-value = 0.0021, 95% CI 0.01442823 to 0.06527977) breast carcinomas.
